## 275. TAIL
### Definition
Most generic term for the appendage of an animal attached to its posterior. (CoBL) Of mammals (not birds, fish, snakes, etc.). Generic term, applied to as many different species as possible. Not to be confused with possible narrow terms, such as ‘small tail as of a goatling’ etc.  (GLD)

### Contexts
1. Animals have tails, man does not have a tail. (GLD) 2. [The beast] is swishing its tail to drive away the flies. (GLD) 3. He cut off [the beast’s] tail. (GLD)
